participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

bdefs_calm_down_p.Description: Has trouble calming themselves down once they are emotionally upset | 1= Never or Rarely ; 2= Sometimes ; 3= Often ; 4= Very Often ; 777= Refuse to Answer

bdefs_consequences_p.Description: Likely to do things without considering the consequences for doing them | 1= Never or Rarely ; 2= Sometimes ; 3= Often ; 4= Very Often ; 777= Refuse to Answer

bdefs_distract_upset_p.Description: Cannot seem to distract themselves away from whatever is upsetting them emotionally to help calm down Can't refocus their mind to a more positive framework. | 1= Never or Rarely ; 2= Sometimes ; 3= Often ; 4= Very Often ; 777= Refuse to Answer

bdefs_explain_idea_p.Description: Has trouble explaining their ideas as well or as quickly as others | 1= Never or Rarely ; 2= Sometimes ; 3= Often ; 4= Very Often ; 777= Refuse to Answer

bdefs_explain_pt_p.Description: Can't seem to get to the point of their explanations | 1= Never or Rarely ; 2= Sometimes ; 3= Often ; 4= Very Often ; 777= Refuse to Answer

bdefs_explain_seq_p.Description: Has difficulty explaining things in their proper order or sequence | 1= Never or Rarely ; 2= Sometimes ; 3= Often ; 4= Very Often ; 777= Refuse to Answer

bdefs_impulsive_action_p.Description: Acts without thinking things over | 1= Never or Rarely ; 2= Sometimes ; 3= Often ; 4= Very Often ; 777= Refuse to Answer

bdefs_inconsistant_p.Description: Inconsistent in the quality or quantity of their work performance | 1= Never or Rarely ; 2= Sometimes ; 3= Often ; 4= Very Often ; 777= Refuse to Answer

bdefs_lazy_p.Description: Seems lazy or unmotivated | 1= Never or Rarely ; 2= Sometimes ; 3= Often ; 4= Very Often ; 777= Refuse to Answer

bdefs_process_info_p.Description: Doesn't seem to process information quickly or accurately | 1= Never or Rarely ; 2= Sometimes ; 3= Often ; 4= Very Often ; 777= Refuse to Answer

bdefs_rechannel_p.Description: Not able to re-channel or redirect their emotions into more positive ways or outlets when they get upset | 1= Never or Rarely ; 2= Sometimes ; 3= Often ; 4= Very Often ; 777= Refuse to Answer

bdefs_sense_time_p.Description: Has a poor sense of time | 1= Never or Rarely ; 2= Sometimes ; 3= Often ; 4= Very Often ; 777= Refuse to Answer

bdefs_shortcuts_p.Description: Takes short cuts in their chores, school work, or other assignments and not do all that they are supposed to do | 1= Never or Rarely ; 2= Sometimes ; 3= Often ; 4= Very Often ; 777= Refuse to Answer

bdefs_stop_think_p.Description: Doesn't stop and talk things over with themselves before deciding to do something | 1= Never or Rarely ; 2= Sometimes ; 3= Often ; 4= Very Often ; 777= Refuse to Answer

bdefs_ss_sum.Description: Executive function summary score: Sum of all items; maximally 1 item missing / refused to answer

bdefs_ss_sympt.Description: Executive function symptom count: Sum of all items with value >= 3; maximally 1 item missing / refused to answer
